  • Prismatic Nature

SAIC Fashion Resource Center

For this take-away viewbook, helloplease worked with the School of the Art Institute of Chicago's Fashion Resource Center to create a unique glimpse into their rich collection. Careful consideration of meteriality and form, in addition to typography bring this view to life.
